verses.verse: וַיָּ֖קָם <S%H6965><s%> abide וַיֵּלַ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> along וִיהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> Jonathan בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> Then came הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> Ai

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> abide דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David נֹ֔בֶה <S%H5011><s%> Nob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲחִימֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> unto Ahimelech הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וַיֶּחֱרַ֨ד <S%H2729><s%> be afraid אֲחִימֶ֜לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> to Ahimelech לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7122><s%> befall דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ מַדּ֤וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> how אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you לְבַדֶּ֔ךָ <S%H905><s%> alone וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto me Let no man אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else אִתָּֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answer דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> David לַאֲחִימֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> Ahimelech הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> chief ruler הַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <S%H4428><s%> king צִוַּ֣נִי <S%H6680><s%> appoint דָבָר֒ <S%H1697><s%> act וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answer אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יֵ֧דַע <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge מְא֛וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> fault אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> act אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I שֹׁלֵֽחֲךָ֖ <S%H7971><s%> forsake וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוִּיתִ֑ךָ <S%H6680><s%> appoint וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּעָרִ֣ים <S%H5288><s%> babe יוֹדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מְק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> country פְּלֹנִ֖י <S%H6423><s%> such אַלְמוֹנִֽי׃ <S%H492><s%> one

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> henceforth מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> but יֵּ֧שׁ <S%H3426><s%> but there is תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> Thahash יָדְךָ֛ <S%H3027><s%> under mine hand חֲמִשָּׁה־ <S%H2568><s%> fif לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread תְּנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> on בְיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> hand א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> and הַנִּמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> be able

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> else לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread חֹ֖ל <S%H2455><s%> common אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash יָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> able כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> unto him Of a truth לֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> are holy יֵ֔שׁ <S%H3426><s%> there are אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo נִשְׁמְר֥וּ <S%H8104><s%> beward הַנְּעָרִ֖ים <S%H5288><s%> of the young men אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> also מֵאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> women פ

וַיַּעַן֩ <S%H6030><s%> testify דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> So the priest וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answer ל֗וֹ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> ess עֲצֻֽרָה־ <S%H6113><s%> be able לָ֙נוּ֙ כִּתְמ֣וֹל <S%H8543><s%> before שִׁלְשֹׁ֔ם <S%H8032><s%> before that time בְּצֵאתִ֕י <S%H3318><s%> after וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become כְלֵֽי־ <S%H3627><s%> armour הַנְּעָרִ֖ים <S%H5288><s%> babe קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> him hallowed וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> along חֹ֔ל <S%H2455><s%> common וְאַ֕ף <S%H637><s%> yet כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> its הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day יִקְדַּ֥שׁ <S%H6942><s%> appoint בַּכֶּֽלִי׃ <S%H3627><s%> armour

וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> add ל֥וֹ הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> chief ruler קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> consecrated כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָ֨יָה <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> was there לֶ֗חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread הַפָּנִים֙ <S%H6440><s%> before הַמּֽוּסָרִים֙ <S%H5493><s%> behead מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לָשׂוּם֙ <S%H7760><s%> appoint לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread חֹ֔ם <S%H2527><s%> heat בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [was] there that day הִלָּקְחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3947><s%> accept

וְשָׁ֡ם <S%H8033><s%> in it אִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> he מֵעַבְדֵ֨י <S%H5650><s%> bondage שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> age הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נֶעְצָר֙ <S%H6113><s%> be able לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> accept יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God וּשְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> base דֹּאֵ֣ג <S%H1673><s%> Doeg הָאֲדֹמִ֑י <S%H130><s%> the Edomites אַבִּ֥יר <S%H47><s%> strong הָרֹעִ֖ים <S%H7473><s%> shipherd אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לְשָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> Saul

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David לַאֲחִימֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> Ahimelech וְאִ֛ין <S%H371><s%> not יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> there are פֹּ֥ה <S%H6311><s%> here תַֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> Thahash יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> able חֲנִ֣ית <S%H2595><s%> javelin אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> and חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> The sword כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again חַרְבִּ֤י <S%H2719><s%> the sword וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again כֵּלַי֙ <S%H3627><s%> armour לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not לָקַ֣חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> if thou wilt take בְיָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> able כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> act הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king נָחֽוּץ׃ <S%H5169><s%> require haste ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answer הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> chief ruler חֶרֶב֩ <S%H2719><s%> dagger גָּלְיָ֨ת <S%H1555><s%> Goliath הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֜י <S%H6430><s%> Philistine אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after הִכִּ֣יתָ ׀ <S%H5221><s%> beat בְּעֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> dale הָאֵלָ֗ה <S%H425><s%> Elah הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold הִ֞יא <S%H1931><s%> he לוּטָ֣ה <S%H3874><s%> cast בַשִּׂמְלָה֮ <S%H8071><s%> apparel אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after that הָאֵפוֹד֒ <S%H646><s%> ephod אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אֹתָ֤הּ <S%H853><s%> תִּֽקַּח־ <S%H3947><s%> accept לְךָ֙ קָ֔ח כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else אַחֶ֛רֶת <S%H312><s%> other man זוּלָתָ֖הּ <S%H2108><s%> beside בָּזֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> he וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answer דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else כָּמ֖וֹהָ <S%H3644><s%> according to תְּנֶ֥נָּה <S%H5414><s%> add לִּֽי׃

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> abide דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> unto him [Is] not this David וַיִּבְרַ֥ח <S%H1272><s%> drive away בַּיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> age הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> accept שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul וַיָּבֹ֕א <S%H935><s%> abide אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אָכִ֖ישׁ <S%H397><s%> of Achish מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king גַּֽת׃ <S%H1661><s%> Gath

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> answer עַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> bondage אָכִישׁ֙ <S%H397><s%> Achish אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> he דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> And David מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> common הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not לָזֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> he יַעֲנ֤וּ <S%H6030><s%> testify בַמְּחֹלוֹת֙ <S%H4246><s%> company לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> answer הִכָּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> beat שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> Saul [בַּאֲלָפֹו כ] (בַּאֲלָפָ֔יו <S%H505><s%> thousand ק) וְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David [בְּרִבְבֹתֹו כ] (בְּרִבְבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H7233><s%> many ק)

וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> appoint דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> act הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another בִּלְבָב֑וֹ <S%H3824><s%> heart וַיִּרָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> affright מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> diligently מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> accept אָכִ֥ישׁ <S%H397><s%> Achish מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king גַּֽת׃ <S%H1661><s%> Gath

וַיְשַׁנּ֤וֹ <S%H8138><s%> do speak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> טַעְמוֹ֙ <S%H2940><s%> advice בְּעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> affliction וַיִּתְהֹלֵ֖ל <S%H1984><s%> boast בְּיָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> able [וַיְתַו כ] (וַיְתָיו֙ <S%H8427><s%> confession ק) עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דַּלְת֣וֹת <S%H1817><s%> door הַשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate וַיּ֥וֹרֶד <S%H3381><s%> descend רִיר֖וֹ <S%H7388><s%> spittle אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about זְקָנֽוֹ׃ <S%H2206><s%> beard

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answer אָכִ֖ישׁ <S%H397><s%> Achish אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֲבָדָ֑יו <S%H5650><s%> bondage הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold תִרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> advise self אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he מִשְׁתַּגֵּ֔עַ <S%H7696><s%> of mad men לָ֛מָּה <S%H4100><s%> that תָּבִ֥יאוּ <S%H935><s%> that ye have brought אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about חֲסַ֤ר <S%H2638><s%> Have I need מְשֻׁגָּעִים֙ <S%H7696><s%> this [fellow] to play the mad man אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> I כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֲבֵאתֶ֣ם <S%H935><s%> in my presence? shall this [fellow] come אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this לְהִשְׁתַּגֵּ֖עַ <S%H7696><s%> the madman עָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> and הֲזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> one יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> you have brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּיתִֽי׃ <S%H1004><s%> court ס
